definitions.definition: A humorous play on words ; such plays on words collectively .
A witty verbal exchange ; such exchanges collectively.
The part of a cryptic clue that indicates but does not define the solution.

main_definition: A humorous play on words ; such plays on words collectively .
secondary_definitions: A witty verbal exchange ; such exchanges collectively.
( crosswording ) The part of a cryptic clue that indicates but does not define the solution.
